p: The top five largest orders of medicinal plants include Lamiales, Rosales, Malpighiales, Fabales and Sapindales [ 12]. The Medicinal Plant Database is a comprehensive multi-omics database of medicinal plants [ 12]. Using sequencing technology and synthetic biology, this genomic and transcriptomic mapping database will allow for the development of synthetic drugs that will be able to target a certain molecular pathway in a given disease process.
